channel.title: [PI] ::freeze & ::unfreeze Command [PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I need a ::freeze command that works sort of like ice barrage so I can freeze players on the spot and prevent them from moving. Sounds weird, I know, but I have a cool idea in mind.
Obviously having this ::freeze command means I'm going to need to have some sort of ::unfreeze command as well, so yeah.
All help is appreciated.
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] ::freeze & ::unfreeze Command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Then you need to find the variable your server uses to freeze the player.

I don’t know what it is since I’m not looking at your files.

Look for it in your combat assistant, or in your process() method in client.java, since most PI servers check those values every 600ms.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ::freeze & ::unfreeze Command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Post your freeze command. It’s going to be the same as that, but setting the value to 0 or -1…

I don’t have a freeze command. I need help making one.

Read full topic
